## Screening Visit Identifiers

**Participant study ID:** __________________________

**Date of screening (dd/mm/yyyy):** ____ / ____ / ______

**Staff initials:** __________________________

**Location / mode:** ☐ In person ☐ Telephone


## Before the Screening Visit (TICK when COMPLETED)

  $\square$ Participant identified from an approved source (registry list / clinic / referral / self-referral)

  $\square$ Screening appointment scheduled

  $\square$ Appropriate time allocated

## During the Screening Visit

### Programme Explanation (TICK when COMPLETED)

  $\square$ Explained that this is a *service*, not a research study

  $\square$ Voluntary nature of participation confirmed

  $\square$ Screening explained as an eligibility and safety check only

  $\square$ Overview of TMR, food reintroduction, and maintenance phases provided

### Eligibility Checks (TICK if ELIGIBILITY MET)

  $\square$ Age within programme limits

  $\square$ HbA1C within programme limits

  $\square$ Type 2 diabetes diagnosis confirmed

  $\square$ Duration of diabetes within criteria

  $\square$ Recent clinic attendance confirmed

  $\square$ BMI meets eligibility threshold (measured or recent)

### Safety Exclusions Reviewed (TICK if EXCLUSION REASON APPLIES)

  $\square$ Pregnancy or breastfeeding excluded
  
  $\square$ Recent major cardiovascular event excluded
  
  $\square$ Severe renal impairment excluded
  
  $\square$ Active eating disorder excluded
  
  $\square$ Other significant exclusions considered
  
  $\square$ Borderline eligibility identified and escalated (if applicable)

### Participant Understanding (TICK when COMPLETED)

  $\square$ Time commitment explained
  
  $\square$ Medication changes under supervision explained
  
  $\square$ Opportunity for questions provided


## Outcome of Screening 

### Outcome (CHOOSE ONE)

  $\square$ Eligible
  
  $\square$ Not eligible
  
### Interested (CHOOSE ONE)

  $\square$ Interested in proceeding to baseline visit

  $\square$ Not interested in proceeding

If interested:

  $\square$ Baseline visit scheduled

If not interested:

  $\square$ Option of routine data use as control explained (where applicable)


## After the Screening Visit (TICK when COMPLETED)

  $\square$ Screening outcome recorded in REDCap
  
  $\square$ Notes added where relevant (e.g. escalation, safeguarding)

  $\square$ Next steps communicated to participant
